fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025.tests_utils

Class TestsStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025.tests_utils.TestsStatistics

  • public class TestsStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    The class TestsStatistics implements an object used to collect statistics about test scenarios.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2025-09-22

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean conditions
      keeps track of the success of conditions in each scenario.
      protected boolean correctResult
      keeps track of the correctness of results in each scenario.
      protected int numberOfFailedScenarios
      number of test scenarios that failed.
      protected int numberOfSuccessfulScenarios
      number of test scenarios that succeeded.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestsStatistics()
      create a test statistics collector.

      log the tests statistics.
      void updateStatistics()
      update the statistics on the successful and failed scenario and reinitialise for the next scenario.
